info.label: Game Developer
info.brief: I am a game developer with a passion for problem solving and working with computers. I've released three games in Unity and Godot using C#, including multiplayer, 2D puzzle, and arcade style games. I have also developed a media converter to enable the user to watch videos in vanilla Minecraft. Some of my favorite games are Jedi: Survivor, Portal, and Redout 2.

history.summary: Assist in balancing and testing Two Robots Unleashed, Two Robots Studios flagship title.
highlights: Collaborated with the Lead Game Designer to design and test faction abilities.
Provided ongoing feedback on other aspects of the game including core game mechanic systems.
Recorded and supplied assessments of playtest sessions.

history.summary: Designed and developed games systems using Godot and Unity.
highlights:
[MoonSpire](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3509090/MoonSpire/): A short 2D puzzle platformer with rage-game elements.
  - Made use of a community-generated library to persist user settings and game state between sessions.
  - Created a state machine to run enemies, an interface to create a scaleable tool system and polymorphism to make a multipurpose lock and door system for puzzles and the boss.
  - Original sprites created using Aseprite.

[Heavens Ablaze](https://treadthedawngames.github.io/): A peer to peer multiplayer physics based spaceship simulator.
  - Developed systems to display a holographic depiction of the damage state of the pilot's ship and track enemies across their HUD.
  - Utilized the Unity Asset Store.
  - Shipped in 6 months.

projects.title: SOL
projects.summary: Originally created in 96 hours, collaborated with two other developer/designers to create an arcade physics game about looping planets to gain as many points as you can using GDScript, Godot, and Open Source Art assets.
projects.description: An entry to GMTK Game Jam 2024: Built to Scale.
highlights: Scored top 16% in 'Enjoyment'
Designed Gameplay
Implimented Shaders
Provided post-jam updates to polish
Optomized/refactored collaborators' code

projects.title: Babel or Bacon
projects.summary: Originally created in 96 hours, collaborated with one other developer/designer to create a deck building, tower construction arcade game for GMTK Game Jam 2024: Built to Scale using C# and Godot.
projects.description: An entry to GMTK Game Jam 2024: Built to Scale.
highlights: Used collections of various types to manage the deck and player hand and built-in physics to stick objects together for the Glue feature.
Created a launcher for easy updates.
Ranked in top 50% of 7,597 entries.

projects.title: Open Source: Chronos Pointer - RimWorld Mod
projects.summary: A mod to enhance the schedule panel with dynamic time indicators for improved colony management and time tracking.
highlights: 20,000+ current users/subscribers.
Implimented mod settings.
Ensured compatibility with official DLC and major update 1.6.

projects.title: Open Source: XenoPreview - RimWorld Mod
projects.summary: A mod which shows a preview of your custom Xenotypes as you create them.
highlights: Refactored the preview window to spawn in a way that works better within the RimWorld codebase.
Added feature: draggable window.
Ensured compatibility with RimWorld 1.6.
Ensured compatibility with other mod: Xenotype and Ideology Buttons TitleScreen

projects.title: Open Source: Pawn Editor - RimWorld Mod
projects.summary: Added Random Faction options when selecting a pawn's faction, each appearing when its context is relevant.
highlights: Added functionality to select a random faction for a pawn based on various filters.
Fixed a bug where the UI wasn't updating when a starting item was deleted.
Made Starting Items visible on faction items screen.
Assisted in ensuring compatibility to 1.6.

projects.title: Open Source: Zetrith’s Multiplayer - RimWorld Mod
projects.summary: Added a window that shows current known issues to the user the first time they open the Server Explorer.
highlights: Multi-language support.
Never show again button.
Allows an arbitrary number of known issues.

projects.title: The Cordova Expedition
projects.summary: Originally created in 9 days, collaborated with four other developer/designers/artists to create an arcade a shoot-em-up sidescroller inspired by FTL using GDScript, Godot.
projects.description: An entry to Godot Wild Jam #81: Expedition.
highlights: Designed and programmed the shop system
Created a tilemap based system for ship construction
Made procedural level system using map system created by another developer

projects.title: V2MC (Video to Minecraft Datapack)
projects.summary: A tool which converts videos to the resources required to watch it in Minecraft 1.20.4. It is multiplayer friendly so you can watch with friends! Made with WinForms and C#.
projects.description: A Library with a Command Line utility and WinForms app using C#, FFMpeg/FFProbe, ImageMagick, and a blueprint of a Minecraft datapack to convert video files to resources allowing it to be watched as a movie in multiplayer Minecraft without mods.
highlights: Utilized FFMpeg/FFProbe and ImageMagick libraries to show a preview of output.
Audio in game automatically resyncs to video if server lag causes a desync.
Used the I/O file system to automatically install the output to the proper place in the Minecraft directories.

projects.title: Audio Maze
projects.summary: Originally created in 4 hours, created an echolocation simulator using GDScript, Godot.
projects.description: An entry to Godot Wild Jam #82: Unseen.
highlights: 3D Audio
Time crunch

projects.title: Prototype: Rogue Souls
projects.summary: Built on past experience in C# and Godot to create a prototype of a moddable, fixed-perspective, run-based dungeon crawler.
highlights: Created data-driven Actions to allow for many different behaviors with a tweak of a few variables.

projects.title: Prototype: Dungeons and Decks
projects.summary: A Balatro-inspired game based on the solitaire card game, Scoundrel.
highlights: Translated C# card system made for Babel or Bacon into GDScript.
Expanded said card system to include callbacks for ease of use in other projects.

projects.title: Prototype: Rimguistics - RimWorld Mod
projects.summary: A RimWorld mod to add languages to pawn's interactions.
highlights: Utilized Harmony to create a system which interrupts pawns' interactions, making them fail unless they share a language.
Created custom-named languages using built-in RimWorld logic.
Made pawns unable to trade unless they share a language.

recognition.from: An Coimisiún le Rincí Gaelacha (The Irish Dance Commission)
recognition.title: 5x World Qualified Irish Dancer
recognition.event: CLRG Southern Region Oireachtas, CLRG North American Irish Dancd Championship

interests.name: RimWorld Modding
interests.summary: I love creating mods with a buddy of mine. We've made two together so far!

interests.name: Irish Dance
interests.summary: Irish Dance is how I stay fit. Not only is it healthy, it's fun!
